quotes.quote: Human life is fiction's only theme.
A human life is just a heartbeat in heaven.
Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning.
The shadow of human life is traced upon a golden ground of immortal hope.
A human life gains luster and strength only when it is polished and tempered.
Human life without some form of poetry is not human life but animal existence.
All the rarest hues of human life take radiance and are rainbowed out in tears.
The brevity of human life gives a melancholy to the profession of the architect.
Human life is truly a short affair. It is better to live doing the things that you like.
A human life is a story told by God.
A human life is a schooling for eternity.
Human life must be some form of mistake.
All human life can be found in an airport.
The basic condition of human life is happiness.
In human life, economics precedes politics or culture.
Human life is the only thing that takes care of itself.
The most evident quality of human life is its loneliness.
Human life is created in God's image, and that makes it sacred.
Even potential human life needs to be treated with great respect.
All human life at every stage of its development is worthy of protection.
Human life is far more important than just getting to the top of a mountain.
The answer to human life is not to be found within the limits of human life.
Human life runs its course in the metamorphosis between receiving and giving.
Human life implies adventure, and there is no adventure without struggles and dangers.
Human life, its growth, its hopes, fears, loves, et cetera, are the result of accidents.
The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
Human life is everywhere a state in which much is to be endured and little to be enjoyed.
It's the great mystery of human life that old grief passes gradually into quiet tender joy.
It is a fundamental rule of human life, that if the approach is good, the response is good.
Every human life has infinite value and to destroy even one is a crime against all humanity.
Every human life had its pattern that had to be worked out slowly to its ultimate conclusion.
A purpose of human life, no matter who is controlling it, is to love whoever is around to be loved.
How much of human life is lost in waiting?
A kiss may ruin a human life.
Human life is beyond comprehension.
The true object of human life is play.
Human life is too difficult for people.
Nothing in human life is inherently private.
The greatest sweetener of human life is friendship.
It's not easy to shed the idea that human life is sacred.
The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.
Protection of human life can be costly; but so is the neglect of that protection.
Human life is full of the play of samskaras - tendencies developed by repeated actions.
Human life has meaning only to that degree and as long as it is lived in the service of humanity.
